title: Pizza-For-Breakfast Sandwich
directions: Preheat panini press according to manufacturerâ€™s instructions.
Sandwich between pizza slices: arugula, basil, mozzarella, bacon and fried egg. Drizzle with olive oil or hot pepper oil.
Grill sandwich in a panini press until cheese melts and bread is toasted, about 3 to 4 minutes. Cut sandwich in half and serve.
ingredients: 2 leftover pizza slices, preferably square pieces
1 or 2 fried eggs, cooked to your preferred doneness
